speaker: Jonathan
text: The year was 1999, I was working for a pizza company located halfway between the city and the middle of nowhere.

speaker: Jonathan
text: It didn't pay well, but the job was easy.

speaker: Jonathan
text: It was a quiet shift, I only got my first order just before midnight, a small shack far into the woods. But I didn't care, it just meant I could spend more time listening to my music.

speaker: Jonathan
text: Knock, and then put the pizza by the door. That was how the night was supposed to go....
